Features:
* 24 Scientific Labs to Dominate and 3 Environments to Conquer
Hack the power cells in 24 action packed levels and take
over the mad scientist's asteroid base.
* 14 Powers and Turrets - Combining your strategic mind with a
Brawling skill set you will have to use everything at your
disposal to defeat the waves of mutants.
* Over 200 upgrades for each character - Increase your range,
power up your damage, or upgrade your AoE radius to
better dispose of the vile mutants.
* 17 Unique Enemies - Defend against mutant Wasps, Scorpions with
blasters, exploding Ticks and the titanic Crusher Bugs.
* 3 Challenging Bosses - Face off against the most destructive
scientific experiments created by the mad scientist
* Replayability - Unlock achievements and star related challenges
through every level, adding extensive replayability and
bragging rights!
